lead_paragraph: Officials said a guard was in error when he stopped a North Carolina school choir from singing “The Star-Spangled Banner” at the memorial plaza in Manhattan.

headline.print_headline: O Say, Can You Sing? Confusion at Shrine
headline.main: Guard Stops Students From Singing National Anthem at 9/11 Memorial

snippet: Officials said a guard was in error when he stopped a North Carolina school choir from singing “The Star-Spangled Banner” at the memorial plaza in Manhattan.
abstract: Officials at National September 11 Memorial Museum say that one of their security guards was in error for stopping North Carolina middle school choir from singing national anthem on plaza; video posted afterward of incident prompted outrage.
